scenario_1.persona_content: A public health expert and advocate for comprehensive sex education who has been advocating for changes in sex education standards for years. They have worked with various organizations and communities to promote the importance of comprehensive sex education and have been vocal in calling for the inclusion of comprehensive sex education in school curricula. They are passionate about ensuring that all students receive accurate and age-appropriate information about sex and its various aspects, including anatomy, reproduction, and healthy relationships. They are also committed to ensuring that students receive comprehensive sex education that is developmentally and age-appropriate for students in grades K-12.
scenario_1.thought: As someone who values fairness and equality, I find the right option more appealing. Although I would receive less (400 instead of 600), Person A would also receive 400, creating a more equitable distribution. In my view, promoting equality is important, and I am willing to sacrifice some personal gain to achieve a fairer outcome. Therefore, I choose the right option.
